Reviews.Content: A very nice camera to monitor my home when I am away.  I can view my home through the internet and rotate the viewing angle of the camera remotely.  I can even hear what is going on.  I am not that computer literate and had great difficulty getting the wireless to work, however the tech support at Foscam was great.  Steve got my cameras working wirelessly and showed me how to change my password.  If there are too many calls for help, you can leave you phone number and they will call you back.  Note they close at 6:00 central time.

Reviews.Title: foscam dual cam setup
Reviews.Author: john siwek
Reviews.Content: Sandra did a fantastic job! She stayed on the phone with me until my problem was solved. She is the third person I have talked to and she is the one who solved the problem. Sandra deserves 5 stars.The product works great I will buy another Foscam.Thank youVery Much!John Siwek

Reviews.Title: Very good customer support
Reviews.Author: Buck
Reviews.Content: Sandra was very helpful and new what she had to do to get my cameras working I like the support team very friendly and helpful overall and very good find

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI8910W
Reviews.Author: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera form Amazon for my home.  Great camera and does exactly what I had hoped.  Very difficult to set up external connection but Ricky in customer service did a great job helping get all my cameras going.  Highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cameras
Reviews.Author: Paul C. Sider
Reviews.Content: I have had the foscam cameras for about three weeks and I have gotten a lot of help connecting them and being advised how they work.  The cameras pan and tilt so I can see a large area.  Good foscus and have night vision.  I am enjoying them.  I also like the fact that they are WIFI and operate over the internet.

Reviews.Title: Good price, but not as nice as hoped for a "new" model
Reviews.Author: "Perf Coder"
Reviews.Content: I ordered these cameras to replace an Astak Mole that went haywire after roughly 1 year's use (but thankfully Costco refunded me - love their return policy).  Two of these cameras were cheaper than one Astak, so I opted for the two-pack.  The video quality is definitely superior to the Astak, but the Foscam's embedded software (web interface) is very disappointing.  I could not recommend this to anyone who is not familiar with basic TCP/IP networking settings and configuring a wireless router.  The Astak's automated set-up and embedded browser are much better.  The Foscam IE ActiveX plug-in will not install (on my 3 computers) on Win7 x64 SP1 with IE9, or any of my family members' computers with various flavors of Win7.  The server push mode does work for Chrome, and if you install the VLC plug-in, it even works with audio.I primarily view/control the camera on my Android phone, and my wife on her iPhone, and we have both found that IP Cam Viewer by Robert Chau is a must-have.  With the Foscam, the audio is supported (it wasn't with the Astak).Also, it's great that these cameras come with a wall-mount bracket.  The downside, though, is that if you want to set it on a shelf, the camera cannot be angled down very much.  The baby's crib is not viewable from the same spot on the bookshelf as with the Astak, so I'll have to mount it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera ... Worth it
Reviews.Author: Fwz
Reviews.Content: This security cam is great. Got it by mail and within one hour got it to work. The manual has all the information needed to make it work. Although I think a little background with PCs will help you in configuring it easily. The colors are good. The 'email a photo on motion' option is great. I would say its worth the money. Tried it now for one week no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera once everything is set up!
Reviews.Author: Quincy S. Lin
Reviews.Content: Again like everyone says, you'll have to be IT (Informational Technology) savvy to set this up.  There walk through support on their website is pretty thorough and I think they have improved their service. The only down fall was when I got my 2 pack, it took me 5 hours to realize that their wifi feature was defective.  I then opened up the 2nd camera and it only took me 30 minutes to set up!

Reviews.Title: Excellent cameras
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I have a number of Foscam units and they all perform about the same way.  These operate just like the previous model except the IR mode is set to auto by default and you can hear an audible relay click when the IR switches on and off.  If you're using the camera in a location where the light changes rapidly or a room that's really quiet, you will notice it.  The only downside to these units (every one I've owned) is the sound quality.  While that's not the primary reason I bought it, there is an inordinate amount of RF noise that comes through.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Brigando
Reviews.Content: Exceed expectations within the price point. Well made and high quality. I have my camera set to take still shots which are transmitted to a secure website when motion is detected. Works pretty well and with a laptop or computer you can set it to take continuous video. A lot of great applications out there for you Iphone and Android fans which virtually allow you to do anything you want when out of the home and on your PDA.

Reviews.Title: Very poor support.
Reviews.Author: Martha L. Chase
Reviews.Content: Customer service was not good at all.  After being on hold for 15 minutes I decided to go on chat.  After 8 minutes waiting for an agent I typed the question.  No response.  Then a disconnect.  I went on chat again, waited 6 minutes, typed my question and no response.  I wish I had used another company.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: S. Michaels "Dearly Departed Tours"
Reviews.Content: Though I waited quite a while on the phone, Kate talked me through the set up.  I loved my first FOSCAM and bought 2 more.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great idea but....
Reviews.Author: Sojourner
Reviews.Content: This is not an easy product to set up, especially if you want to view from the internet. After literally a half of a day on the phone with tech help in India we finally got it working...kinda of. I had to control one cam from one firefox and another from IE. I could only view both from IE. If I want to activate the alarms I had to log into both browsers but had decreased functionality through Firefox. It is probably due to how the tech helped set it up. If you are hoping to view your cams from a work computer make sure that your work doesn't care if you have to place their computer systems security in jeopardy because you have to enable some pretty risky internet setting to do this.So I wake up today to find that all of my original setting were gone and one cam will not respond. I am sure if you were a extremely tech savvy person you might be ok, but even then I think it would be challenging. Everything about the idea of this cam, and what it could do is awesome...however sometimes lame firmware kills the deal. I will be returning these and installing an ADT system.

Reviews.Title: Foscam review
Reviews.Author: Bigegale2k
Reviews.Content: While the product itself is great, sturdy, well built and the functionality is awesome (night vision, motion activated etc...) I am having such a difficult time setting up the port forwarding so I can view the video on my iphone.  If it was a little easier to set up, I would give it 5 stars but if you are not technically savvy, be warned its tough to configure.  I have been all over youtube trying to figure out the port forwarding piece so its taking way more time than it should.My $.02, somehow make this piece automated when you download the software or warn people you need to be a Networking Engineer to get it up and running.

Reviews.Title: This is a great product- terrible setup
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great. The pan/ tilt feature is amazing and the camera has a very clear shot. It truly is a 5 star product - especially for the value you get here.But, the setup was terrible. I am a tech- savvy person, and could not figure out the first steps in connecting. Unless you are a wiz at port forwarding, be prepared for a long day of installation. I was forced to spend hours on the phone, with two different levels of support. They also require to take control of your computer. Contrary to other reviews, I found that the customer service there was completely willing ( though quite unable) to help. They did take a long time to return my call though.

Reviews.Title: Sandra was  excellent and very helpful
Reviews.Author: butan
Reviews.Content: The product is very good and I am planning to buy one more after Sandra helped me with this. I would recommend this foscam camera and tech support.

Reviews.Title: Seriously???!?!?!?!
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: Got the items quick and as advertised, however, having problems with the cameras...First, setting them up was a real pain in the butt.  I am an IT professional and everything needing to be done in the camera software and router took at least 5 hours.  Secondly, I can view the cameras remotely via wi-fi from my iPad while on my wi-fi network, and also from my Iphone 4s from anywhere.  However, when I try to log in from work, i get an error message stating that the website refused to show it's webpage.  Now remember, I am looking at the page, while at work from my Iphone when I try to connect via my work computer.  The next issue I have is when I attempt to pan with the camera via my devices remotely....The software/webpage will only allow me to use the auto-pan feature, for lack of better words.  I have to stop the camera manually by selecting the stop button from the website.  This is a pain, because of the size of the Iphone 4s screen size.  You have to increase the screen size to be able to select the option to stop the camera from pan mode, but you have to be able to make sure that the camera is pointing at what you want to see, but you can't because it is too small.  Additionally, attempting to change the default location of the motion detection recording location has not worked.  The software won't allow me to make a permanent change.  As soon as you try to change the location an error message pops up.  Something to the affect of illegal parameter or something.  Also, how in the world do you change the admin password and account name?  Anyone who works in IT Security will tell you that you want to rename your admin user account and change from the default password.  I mean, really?  Foscam has about 50 default usernames and passwords for different makes and models of routers on their website to help during installation.So, in closing, I like the cameras themselves a lot, however, the software sucks and needs to be upgraded quick, fast and in a hurry or they will lose customers, which includes me!Oh, don't let me forget, that in order to view your camera remotely, you have to create an account with a company that does DNS hosting, who gets enough information from you to be able to hack your LAN....Just seems ironic to me that this company, Foscam, a Hong Kong based company, won't let you change the admin account username, change the password, and suggests that we use a DNS hosting service for access to our home PCs.

Reviews.Title: Cameras & Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Archuleta
Reviews.Content: I just got my cameras and easily setup the wireless portion but had trouble following the remote access instructions.  I called Foscam support and the remote support was setup for me in a few minutes.  Great support from Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Just bought
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I just bought the Foscam camera. So far the cameras appear to work well. I had to get customer support to get these set up, but my tech Calvin was very helpful in getting this accomplished.

Reviews.Title: F18910w cam
Reviews.Author: CV "Italian music lover"
Reviews.Content: I received great customer support. I just called and they were able to have my camera running in less than 10 minutes via remote control This support was awesome. Thanks Irish for setting up my camera so quickly. You were very helpful. I am using this camera for home security. I love that I can get email warnings with a picture once the camera detects movement.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Thomas for the assistance with setting up the foscam cameras. Looks great.
Reviews.Author: Teddy Banica
Reviews.Content: Great service.Fast and accurate. The tech support made it easy to get started with my new cams. The video quality is great

Reviews.Title: Instant customer support
Reviews.Author: ptlvr "ptlvr"
Reviews.Content: I was contacted immediately by customer support  to make sure that I was satisfied with my purchase. They are working with me now to make sure the cameras work.

Reviews.Title: Effective and Affordable
Reviews.Author: Caroline M Meyer "Carrie M."
Reviews.Content: The range of options in this camera combined with quality make this an outstanding value.  While youtube tutorials, forums etc. are helpful, don't hesitate to call customer service.  I spoke with John and he was excellent - intelligent and well spoken.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Content: Was having problems with getting an error message and the cameras not sending the pictures to email. Ralph MendezNormally on an everyday basis its hard to find excellent customer service; however, i spoke with Ralph who went over above and beyond with providing great service. He answered every question and concern i had. I give foscam cameras and support 5 stars. I have already ordered a total of 6 foscam cameras and i will continue to order there products. Great product with great service.

Reviews.Title: good customer service
Reviews.Author: hatemagic
Reviews.Content: Calvin was very helpful , to take care of setup and troubleshootingill give it 5 star great  customer support

Reviews.Title: Great! Easy install and fantastic support
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Clubb
Reviews.Content: Although overall the cameras were easy to install I did have to refer to support on my router for port fowarding problem. Andrew was very good with providing support from Foscam and did not even care if the router was netgear. He remoted in and helped me and it was a big relief. Thanks Foscam and thank you Andrew.Highly Recommended

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera Tech Support
Reviews.Author: mcioffoletti
Reviews.Content: Issue: To set the camera wireless and to vie it over the internet.About the Service: RickyAmazing information and service.Everything was set up and completed in a timely mannerTechnician was nice and did everything I needed.Very satisfied.Avout The Camera: VEry satisfied with the camera, good picture, like the remote control. Would consider purchasing another one.

Reviews.Title: A+++ Recommended product
Reviews.Author: Jackielyn
Reviews.Content: excellent support from tech support steve, highly recommend this product.cam works well in iphone can control it . it does the motion detection recording.Excellent product for baby monitoring.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: James Walters
Reviews.Content: Issue: Port forwarding and email alarm settings.Ricky , the foscam service tech , walked through all problems and had everything up and running in no time.Great cameras, great service, would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Installation
Reviews.Author: KEVIN B BROWN
Reviews.Content: The price was a tip high - but it was for both cameras. I tested them at home. The subject was the car parked on the road and in the yard. The setup was fairly easy. Got it operating wirelessly. A wireless laptop was the monitor. So that was cool. Got the image on an iphone. Was able to find the recordings on the laptop. Played with the recordings. These were the problems I found.... sigh. The mosquito mesh bounced back the IR signal so it was like looking into the sun. The IR has to be turned off, then the picture looked good again. This happens as baby cam also - mosquito mesh.As planned I gave away both cams. Will buy the latest model again to test DNS linkup and install at home.

Reviews.Title: Model: FI8910W. Technical support is excellent!
Reviews.Author: JohnS
Reviews.Content: Have problem with port forwarding. Ralph Mendez, the technical support gave me great help.  This camera is very good: very clear picture and can access remotely. I'm thinking getting the outdoor version also.

Reviews.Title: Foscam customer service
Reviews.Author: MARCELO S DE FREITAS
Reviews.Content: I was not able to set up remote access and I've talked to harry foster and he solved everything. The service was great , and very polite and attentive. I use these cameras for monitoring my kids bedrooms. It works perfect.I have two cameras.

Reviews.Title: Foscam review
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: The ncameras I recently purchased are great. I'm not IT savvy but the Tech Support section has been extremely helpful.Calvin Harris was able to assit me in the most professional manner. Thanks again for the great support.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, SO hard to set up!
Reviews.Author: usmcwife1010
Reviews.Content: Oh my goodness I hate this camera! Ok, not really the camera itself, 'cause it really is great. But it took me about 12 hours (with a few breaks, and taking care of my kid) to get it all set up and working on my computer, making it wireless wasn't really that hard, but oh freaking boy did I have trouble getting it on my android app! I watched 2 youtube videos as well as read half the reviews on here that explain how to do everything, but it's just so super hard if they don't have the same systems that you do! And then when whatever they did works for them (on youtube), but doesn't work for you and they don't say "if that didn't work for you, here's what to do...", it's that much harder! I finally managed to get it to work on my android app (IP Cam Viewer Pro) so I got to use it as a baby monitor last night (worked flawlessly), but I can only view it inside my home network. I have probably another 12 hours worth of work trying to figure out how to make it work on 3/4G and other wireless networks! I did so much "bs-ing" yesterday that I know I'm going to have just as much trouble setting up my second camera!Aside from the million issues I had with setting it up, it is a pretty good camera. Mine is about a second behind real time, which isn't really that big of an issue, don't know if there's anything I can do to fix that. The Pan/tilt is awesome, has a very wide range which is great when you have a very active toddler! The audio is pretty good, but the 2 way (us talking through the camera into the room) is sooo quiet. If we want anyone in that room to hear us, we have to shout...which makes it pointless at home 'cause we live in an apartment and can be heard shouting without the camera.I haven't been able to figure out a bunch of things though, the instructions don't say anything about setting up all the extra features such as preset positions, recording when motion is detected, how to get the videos sent to your email, all that kind of stuff. I've found where I'm supposed to dink around with all that stuff, but haven't gotten anything to really happen. So I'm with practically everyone else on this. If you don't have much experience with computers, you either need to have A LOT of patience, or a friend to help/do it for you. I'm normally able to bs things fairly easily, so I didn't think I would have so many problems with this. If that's your attitude, get over it right now, 'cause this camera will have you pulling out your hair and (probably more so if you're a girl), wanting to cry because you're so frustrated :)I was on the verge of tears multiple times. Would definitely recommend this camera, just wish it were sold with a tech geek attached! (not making fun of anyone, I promise!)

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Content: Calvin Harris was very helpful and performed great service. Camera is great so far except for losing connection but just call Calvin and he'll g you up and running in no time.

Reviews.Title: Sandra, my tech support did an outstanding job in installing the Foscam
Reviews.Author: BOBBY NEWMAN
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with not only the Foscam camera, but with the Sandra the tech support for Foscam. She took the over the installation of the cameras on my computer and was very helpful, The camera is easy to use on my lap top and on my android phone. I would highly recommend this product for first time users and novice techies like me.

Reviews.Title: Great product, but difficult to set-up to view from outside computers or over 3g/4g
Reviews.Author: Ryan "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: Video review available. See my full product review on youtube with in depth product usage... Search for my channel: INTOWEAPONS

Reviews.Title: Wifi doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Lacyfan
Reviews.Content: I installed this product pretty quickly and it was up and running in no time but the wifi doesn't work. I can't unplug the cable. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but foscam's customer service was no help at all either. I think I'm going to return the product soon if I can't find a solution.

Reviews.Title: setup troubles
Reviews.Author: michael j class
Reviews.Content: These cameras are difficult to set up,  I am an experienced user and had to spend many hours to learn exactly what is required to view them from the internet,, ,,the quick setup guide is vague,,and the user manual skips or omits required steps,,I would not recommend these to any novice network user

Reviews.Title: Faulty IR
Reviews.Author: dg
Reviews.Content: The IR on one of my cameras is faulty. It switches on and off in total darkness every couple seconds, so apart from not being able to seen anything, there's the annoying ticking sound that goes along with the switching.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: TH
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the camera and with both of them; I am having issues with the sound. I then treed to connect remotely and could not (the instructions are not very detailed). I tried numerous times to call into support and I am constantly told that someone will call me back and they never do. I finally got a call back last week but I was at work. I used my remote gotomypc connection and spoke to the support person. He was very, very difficult to understand. Not just because I was calling somewhere outside of the US but because he phone kept breaking up. I did hear enough to hear that he wanted to remotely connect, in which I reluctantly allowed this. As soon as he connected, I lost my gotomypc connection and my machine started popping up with error messages, closed everything down and virus messages started popping up. HE GAVE MY WORK PC A VIRUS! He denied this but it is obvious he did. He said he lost his connection also. It took the support here all day to fix and my pc is different now due to the virus deleting a lot of items. I then went home and MY PC AT HOME HAD THE SAME VIRUS! I shut it off and still do not know how I am going to remove it. So now, I have two video camera that have no sound and I cannot connect remotely to. Along with this, I have a virus on my work pc (which I hope is removed but it is so much slower), and a virus on my home pc which is now unusable. DO NOT BUY THESE CAMERA'S!

Reviews.Title: I need cameras in white, not black
Reviews.Author: Leonel HC
Reviews.Content: Good afternoon. I bought the 2 pack foscam wireless cameras, in black, but I need them in white, can they be changed?. I appreciate your help. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Purchased 3 and can't get them to work
Reviews.Author: Charles Of New York "Charles"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of them with great expectations.  Using supplied sortware, I got only one camera on my computer, and could not get the other 2 on with it. At set up, I tried using: first Wireless and later with cable 5e.  Just could not get them to work all together. I gave up and they are sitting unplugged in the corner for over 2 months.Anyway, when you can get all 3 on supplied software on my PC, instructions want you to go into the Router security system's guts and change access for external viewing. We depend on the router for our living, working from home when away from office, and we dare not tamper with the internal setting of our router and risk loss of work and income.  A big mysterious disappointment.I may buy another router, taking our main router off line , and trying to get the cameras to work with a 2nd router.  If I mess up internet connection  with that 2nd router (while trying open access on the 2nd router for internet viewing) I can always take the 2nd router off-line and plug back in our old, great working, reliable router. I may try that next month.My friend got one camera to work in his home, but he did a work around requiring his home computer to be on all the time when he wants home viewing while away from his laptop.

Reviews.Title: COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY$
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: I needed security cameras,they said these cameras are "wireless" when meanwhile they have to be plugged into a socket in order for them to be on. That right there didnt allow me to mount or even use the cameras in high areas where i wanted them unless i plugged them into an extension cord but if i wanted to have all these wires around my home i wouldnt have gotten cameras that said WIRELESS!! Also the 1 cameras vision came out the box completely blurry, i thought it just needed adjusting but there was no adjusting and the view is still blurry,the night vision is terrible, I cant record whats being seen, the cameras wont allow me and the owners manual (3 paged book) does not explain how to record, also the cameras will have its moments where it send a message saying that it cant connect to a device and FREEZES my computer, i just bought my HP laptop last year and have had 3 freezes and a blue screen after installing these cameras, never had that ever happen before EVER! Everything is manual you have to keep your computer running all day if you want to use the cameras all day, theres no timing application to have the cameras move without you having to move them to the angle you want on the computer. OVERALL THESE CAMERAS COMPLETELY ABSOLUTELY SUCKKKKKK!!! I CANT EMPHASIZE THAT ENOUGH IN THIS REVIEW, $200.00 IS NOT CHUMP CHANGE BUT AFTER BUYING THESE I FEEL LIKE A CHUMP!

ProductInfo.Features:
Building on the success of the Foscam FI8918W, the FI8910W is the latest camera from Foscam Digital Technologies LLC.It features high quality video & audio, pan/tilt, remote internet viewing, motion detection, night-vision, embedded IR-Cut filter, built in network video recording system as well as free telephone technical support available from Foscam Digital Technologies LLC.
The distinguishing features of the FI8910W are the embedded IR-Cut off filter, upgraded external housing, wider horizontal panning range and 2 year Warranty.
The IR-cut filter provides true & accurately images fixing the problems related to washed out and discolored images. In addition, the cut off filter also allows the camera to properly automatically adjust to changing lighting conditions so the user does not manually have to do this.
Also includes, two-way audio monitoring, remote pan/tilt control (pan:300° & tilt:120°), freely control IR-LED on/off for night vision (up to 8 meters)
Remote viewing via local network or internet, record from anywhere anytime, motion detection alert via email or upload image to FTP, Blue Iris compatible; Supports all standard browsers, Iphone, Ipad, Ipod, Android & BlackBerry, Wi-Fi compliant (IEEE 802.11b/g), supports WEP & WPA WPA2 Encryption
ProductInfo.Name: 2 PACK Foscam FI8910W Wireless/Wired Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera with IR-Cut Filter for True Color Images - 8 Meter Night Vision and 3.6mm Lens (67° Viewing Angle) - Black NEWEST MODEL
